text: 15.8: Mt 15.24-25; FG 3.25-26; 2 Ko 1.20Gu khaŋ nde nzuai, Krais, ana Zudain ŋaara guma kɨr zav zɨgap, ana mben kurkurigi. Ana maaŋ mbuav, ana Fhe Bakɨme suaŋgi kamen mbe khɨvim, mba kameŋ, ne guigira kameŋ ma. Ana mba mbe mbui tɨv, ana mba Fhe Bakɨme fhum mben farigi nzɨgi ga suaŋgi kameŋ zɨra vugi.
